thread.title: Samsung Galaxy A5 (2017) and A7 (2017) now available to buy in India
thread.title_full: Samsung Galaxy A5 (2017) and A7 (2017) now available to buy in India

title: Samsung Galaxy A5 (2017) and A7 (2017) now available to buy in India
text:
Samsung Galaxy A5 (2017) and A7 (2017) now available to buy in... Samsung Galaxy A5 (2017) and A7 (2017) now available to buy in India   Galaxy A5 (2017) is priced at Rs 29,990, while the A7 (2017) is available for Rs 33,490‚Äù 
Earlier this month, Samsung launched the 2017 variants of the Galaxy A5 and the Galaxy A7 smartphones in India. Today, the company has started the phones in the country via its e-store as well as in major brick and mortar stores across the country. The Galaxy A5 (2017)   28,990, while the Galaxy A7 (2017) is being offered for Rs 33,490. 
For the uninitiated, the Galaxy A5 and A7 2017 models come with IP68 certification for dust and water resistance, 16MP cameras at both the front and rear, metal and glass bodies, fingerprint sensors, Android Marshmallow, 4G LTE, dual-SIM slots, Samsung Pay, NFC and fast charging support. 
The Galaxy A5 (2017) gets a 5.2-inch full HD Super AMOLED display, a 1.9GHz octa-core SoC, 3GB of RAM, 32GB of storage and a 3,000mAh battery. The Galaxy A7 (2017) gets a bigger 5.7-inch full HD Super AMOLED display and a 3,600mAh battery, while the rest of its specs are similar to the Galaxy A5 (2017). Facebook Comments
